block_comment: This block of code is a watchdog mechanism in Verilog for ensuring correct write commands to a specific port. The mechanism is constantly attentive to the conditions defined in the if statement. It checks if Port 5 is configured as "W32" (write-only, 32 bits) and command for enabling this port has been issued, while invalid commands (other than write, determined by the value of `p5_cmd_instr[2]` and `p5_cmd_instr[0]`) have been requested. If these conditions hold, an error message is displayed indicating invalid command usage and the system simulation is terminated through `$finish`.
